transcript:
Customer: Hello

Executive: Hello

Customer: Haan ji, kaun bol rahe hai aap?

Executive: Pushpendra baat kar raha hu mam.

Customer: Haan ji, haan ji sir.

Executive: Mam aapne koi mail drop kiya hai kya abhi?

Customer: Haan ji ek wo dala tha maine complaint dali thi wahi jo maine aapko dali thi na Mittal traders ki usi ki dali thi maine complaint ki unka original account bhi karao ban.

Executive: Abhay traders ke naam se jo hai.

Customer: Abhay traders ke naam se haan ji.

Executive: Mam wo to already free company hai usse koi matlab hi nahi hai.

Customer: Nahi nahi unhone apne naam ka IndiaMART le rakha hai jaise hamara chal raha hai na unka waise hi chal raha hai Abhay traders ka.

Executive: Jo aapne GST yaha pe update kiya hai na unka wo GST se maine open karke dekha hai unka wo free company hai paid company nahi hai IndiaMART pe.

Customer: Paid company nahi hai maine kisi se karaya tha matlab jinse baat hui thi mere friend ne unse maine karaya tha to wo bol rahe the ki ek bari jinke jinko wo dalna hai problem dalni hai to wahi dal do ye will be the paid company hai.

Executive: Aath saal se upar se inka profile bana hua hai IndiaMART pe.

Customer: Hmm.

Executive: Lekin aaj tak unhone paid service nahi li IndiaMART mein.

Customer: Achha paid service nahi hai to jo service hai wo bhi hat nahi sakti?

Executive: Jo free FTF bana hua hai na wo nahi hat sakta hai.

Customer: Achha wo hat nahi sakta maine Mittal traders ka banaya tha jo pehle wala banaya tha.

Executive: Wo to hata diya na wo to hamara ab aap dekho ab aap Google pe search karo Mittal traders hamara.

Customer: Google pe abhi bhi aa raha hai but matlab wo link nahi khul raha hai but Google pe aa raha hai abhi bhi name to.

Executive: Haan mam wo link nahi khulega abhi ek do din mein humne hata diya apne site se thik hai lekin jo Google hai wo thoda sa time lega na hatane ke liye.

Customer: Hmm hmm hmm hmm hmm.

Executive: To wo bhi hat jayega.

Executive: Humne unka jo website bana hua tha na wo humne pura dissolve kar diya hai.

Customer: Hmm hmm hmm. Agar ye Abhay traders wala bhi hat sakta ho to ye bhi hata dijiye.

Executive: Mam ye Abhay traders ko nahi hatayenge kyuki Abhay traders mein kahi pe bhi aapki koi details yaha pe updated uploaded nahi hai na.

Customer: Hmm.

Executive: Agar by the way kuch bhi yaha pe upload hota na GST hota mobile number hota ya fir kuch bhi chote se chote koi link hota na to hum hata sakte the but aise nahi hata sakte Abhay traders wala.

Executive: Aur waise bhi wo jo wo jo profile hai na Abhay traders wala usme aath saal se kabhi kuch hua hi nahi hai aur na hi hamari side se kabhi kisi ne unko call kiya hai ki aapko services chahiye ya fir nahi chahiye kuch bhi nahi ho raha hai usme.

Customer: Achha.

Executive: Ek trash ke jaise pada hua hai bas.

Customer: Hmm hmm hmm hmm hmm.

Executive: Okay. Uspe to kuch bhi nahi ho sakta na. To aapko mail mujhe karni chahiye thi aapne kaha pe mail kar diya ye direct IndiaMART ke usme kya kar diya?

Customer: Haan ye support system pe kar di actually hmm haan ji support system pe kar di help and support pe actually koi aur kar raha tha ye deal na to fir unhone bola tha ki ispe dal do to fir maine ispe dal di thi.

Customer: Mail nahi dali thi aur matlab maine to bas aise hi complaint issue kara tha.

Executive: Haan to aapko kisne suggest kiya tha ye yaha se karne ke liye? Jo inse deal kar rahe the na ye jo Mittal traders SS wale products the unke sath jisse pata chala tha ki ye kisi aur ka account hai.

Customer: Achha okay. Haan haan haan ji.

Customer: To unhone matlab apni side se ban karane ki koshish kari thi complaint dalne ki fir jab unse unki baat hui thi IndiaMART walon se to unhone bola tha ki jinke account ka GST number hai wo ek bari complaint raise kar denge to ho jayega.

Executive: Haan to aapne jab wo complaint raise kari to humne wo hata diya thik hai ab jo unka personal unka jo original account hai.

Customer: Haan original hum nahi hata sakte.

Customer: Kya?

Executive: Original ke liye aapke sath kuch link hona chahiye ya fir unhone kuch bhi matlab aapki koi bhi detail yaha pe agar Abhay traders wale mein update kiya hota na to hum hata dete.

Customer: Hmm ye sahi hai.

Executive: Agar koi aapka abhi tak to koi duplicate unhone account bana ke rakha hua tha duplicate wala humne hata diya hai.

Customer: Okay okay.

Executive: Okay mam aur koi problem hai isme?

Customer: Nahi nahi bas yahi hai bas ye Google se aur hat jaye to sahi ho jayega.

Executive: Google se hat chuka hai mam dekho unka jo sub domain bana hua tha na unka koi own domain nahi hai sub domain bana hua tha sub domain hum hi banate hai sir wo humne hata diya hai to ab Google pe jo unka ek abhi tak kuch thoda bahut to aapne unke profile mein click kar hi diya tha.

Customer: Hmm hmm hmm hmm hmm.

Executive: Click ki wajah se ab humne hataya kuch time baad wo Google bhi hata dega.

Customer: To ye account dobara se to nahi chalega na?

Executive: Dobara kabhi chalega hi nahi kyuki humne pura pura hi dissolve kar diya hai na use.

Customer: Okay okay thik hai ab agar unhe profile banana hoga na jaise ye Abhay traders wala hai na unhone apne mobile number se bana ke rakha hai waisa hi unhe apne apne mobile number se ya fir apni GST se wo bana payenge aapke kisi usse nahi bana payenge.

Customer: Okay okay thik hai ye sahi hai.

Executive: Thik hai?

Customer: Haan ji.

Executive: Abhi to koi problem nahi hai?

Customer: Nahi nahi bas yahi cheez hai.

Executive: Actually aapne aapne jo abhi concern raise kiya jo support pe aapne mail dala hai na us mail ke through na hamare paas ek concern raise ho gaya hai.

Customer: Haan ji.

Executive: Ticket aapka ticket open ho gaya hai haan abhi main haan abhi main ticket close karunga na aapka to aapke paas ek feedback mail aayega.

Customer: Haan.

Executive: Thik hai? Okay. To uske liye aapko waha par jo mail aapka aapka jo refer mail id hai wo aapke paas rehta hai ya IT ke paas rehta hai?

Customer: Mere paas hi hai.

Executive: Aap hi ke paas hai na to aapke paas waha pe mail aayega please waha pe satisfied mein click karke submit karna padega aapko.

Customer: Okay okay okay okay.

Executive: Thik hai mam?

Customer: Haan ji haan ji thik hai.

Executive: Okay okay thank you. Okay okay thank you.
summary:
Concerns:

- Wants Abhay traders account banned.

- Wants Mittal traders account removed from Google.



Resolution:

- Explained Abhay traders is a free account.

- Mittal traders account removed from IndiaMART.

- Website of Mittal traders dissolved.

- Explained the process of removing from Google.



Next Steps: 

- Customer to submit feedback form.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- account removal, google, complaint, free account
